Class StockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • StockManager
  • public class StockManager
extends Object
    Manage the stock in a business. The stock is described by zero or more Products.
    Version:
    (a version number or a date)
    Author:
    (your name)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StockManager()
      Initialise the stock manager.

      Receive a delivery of a particular product.

      Try to find a product in the stock with the given id.
      int numberInStock​(int id)
      Locate a product with the given ID, and return how many of this item are in stock.
      void printAllProducts()
      Print out each product in the stock in the order they are in the stock list

      Print details of the given product.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StockManager

        public StockManager()
        Initialise the stock manager.

    • Method Detail

      • addProduct

        public void addProduct​(Product item)
        Add a product to the list.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be added.

      • delivery

        public void delivery​(int id,
                     int amount)
        Receive a delivery of a particular product. Increase the quantity of the product by the given amount.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the product.
        amount - The amount to increase the quantity by.

      • findProduct

        public Product findProduct​(int id)
        Try to find a product in the stock with the given id.
        Returns:
        The identified product, or null if there is none with a matching ID.

      • numberInStock

        public int numberInStock​(int id)
        Locate a product with the given ID, and return how many of this item are in stock. If the ID does not match any product, return zero.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the product.
        Returns:
        The quantity of the given product in stock.

      • printProduct

        public void printProduct​(int id)
        Print details of the given product. If found, its name and stock quantity will be shown.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the product to look for.

      • printAllProducts

        public void printAllProducts()
        Print out each product in the stock in the order they are in the stock list
